properties.Name: Cedar Mesa
properties.Vegetation Description (IGBP): Woody Savannas: Lands with herbaceous and other understory systems, and with forest canopy cover between 30-60%. The forest cover height exceeds 2 meters.

properties.Name: UFLUX Bonneville Salt Flats
properties.Vegetation Description (IGBP): Barren Sparse Vegetation: Lands exposed soil, sand, or rocks and has less than 10% vegetative cover during any time of the year.

properties.Name: UFLUX Dugout Ranch
properties.Vegetation Description (IGBP): Croplands: Lands covered with temporary crops followed by harvest and a bare soil period (e.g., single and multiple cropping systems). Note that perennial woody crops will be classified as the appropriate forest or shrub land cover type.

properties.Name: UFLUX Bluff
properties.Vegetation Description (IGBP): Croplands: Lands covered with temporary crops followed by harvest and a bare soil period (e.g., single and multiple cropping systems). Note that perennial woody crops will be classified as the appropriate forest or shrub land cover type.

properties.Name: UFLUX Matheson
properties.Vegetation Description (IGBP): Permanent Wetlands: Lands with a permanent mixture of water and herbaceous or woody vegetation that cover extensive areas. The vegetation can be present in either salt, brackish, or fresh water

properties.Name: UFLUX Nephi
properties.Vegetation Description (IGBP): Croplands: Lands covered with temporary crops followed by harvest and a bare soil period (e.g., single and multiple cropping systems). Note that perennial woody crops will be classified as the appropriate forest or shrub land cover type.
properties.Climate Class Description (Koeppen): Humid Continental: humid with severe winter, no dry season, hot summer

properties.Name: UFLUX Great Salt Lake Phragmites
properties.Vegetation Description (IGBP): Permanent Wetlands: Lands with a permanent mixture of water and herbaceous or woody vegetation that cover extensive areas. The vegetation can be present in either salt, brackish, or fresh water

properties.Vegetation Description (IGBP): Croplands: Lands covered with temporary crops followed by harvest and a bare soil period (e.g., single and multiple cropping systems). Note that perennial woody crops will be classified as the appropriate forest or shrub land cover type.
